Frédéric Chopin

Five Mazurkas, op. 7

1831 · Chomiński 55–59 · Brown 7 (no. 4, first version), 45 (no. 2, first version), 61 (nos. 1–5)

[Wikipedia] · [IMSLP]

Total duration: 9'

  • 1. B-flat major
  • 2. A minor
  • 2. A minor (first version)
  • 3. F minor
  • 4. A-flat major
  • 4. A-flat major (first version)
  • 5. C major

Recommended editions

  • Henle · HN 264 · Mazurken · ed. Ewald Zimmermann [including first versions of nos. 2 and 4]
  • Henle · HN 288 · Mazurken · ed. Ewald Zimmermann [including first versions of nos. 2 and 4]
  • National Edition · 4 (A IV) · Mazurkas (A) · ed. Jan Ekier

1. B-flat major

Duration: 2'

Difficulty: 2.5

2. A minor

Duration: 3'

Difficulty: 2

2. A minor (first version)

This mazurka exists in an earlier version from 1829.

Duration: 2' 30"

Difficulty: 2

3. F minor

Duration: 2' 30"

Difficulty: 3

4. A-flat major

Duration: 1'

Difficulty: 2.5

4. A-flat major (first version)

This mazurka exists in an earlier version from 1824.

Duration: 1'

Difficulty: 2.5

5. C major

In the French first editions, this mazurka was placed instead as the last of the op. 6 set.

Duration: 0' 30"

Difficulty: 2
